activity.title: coronasafe/leaderboard#53
activity.text:
@GokulramGHV I missed out on this. We should have a similar setup just like GitHub

By default, it shows last 365 days 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14979190/172584504-7fb52b95-9e03-40e7-b29a-04df58628d3b.png)


 Picking a year would show the details of that year. 
 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14979190/172584624-4898e646-aaa9-4d2b-b242-c2a0255272de.png)
